conversation.message:
Hi Student_B—thanks for reaching out, and we’re glad School_E is on the top of your list.

In our review, we tend to prioritize:
- Strong academic preparation and upward progress over time
- Evidence of initiative (leading a project, starting a club/activity, community involvement)
- Consistency and reliability (attendance, follow-through, teacher feedback)
- Good fit with our culture: collaborative, respectful, and willing to challenge themselves

Students who do well at School_E usually communicate proactively, manage their workload steadily, and contribute positively to peers—both in and out of class.

If you’re considering submitting an application to School_E this round or next, feel free to tell me what you’d most like to study here and one or two activities/achievements you’re proud of—so we can better understand your fit.
